title: Mushroom Soba Noodles
directions: Cook soba noodles according to packet instructions.
Cut chicken in small pieces, place in a bowl, add cornflour and soya sauce, mix well.
Heat olive oil or groundnut oil in a pan on high heat, add chicken. Stir often and let meat brown a bit.
Peel and finally chop garlic, ginger, onion and add to the meat.
Stir and fry for about a minute.
Slice mushrooms and add them to the pan. Mix well and cook for few minutes, stirring often.
Add oyster sauce, mix, cover the pan, lower the heat and cook for few minutes until chicken is cooked through.
If the mixure is too dry add some of the soba cooking water.
Chop spring onions and chilli (if using).
Drain soba noodles, put them back to the pan. Add toasted sesame oil and stir well.
Add the chicken mushroon sauce to the pan with noodles, mix well.
Divide between bowls, sprinkle with spring onions and chilli (if using) and serve.
ingredients: 250 g chicken meat (boneless thigh or fillet)
400 g of button or chestnut mushrooms
1 teaspoon of olive oil or groundnut oil
